analysis.description:
CrypteloPublicSale.withdrawAllEther (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#297-302) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#300-302)

CrypteloERC20 (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#3-9) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#5-6)

Reentrancy in CrypteloPublicSale.payContributorByAdress (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#184-190):
	External calls:
	- sendTokens(_adr,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#188-189)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorAmount (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#189-190)

Reentrancy in CrypteloPublicSale.payContributorByNumber (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#175-184):
	External calls:
	- sendTokens(adr,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#182)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorAmount (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#183)

CrypteloPublicSale.burnAllTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#230-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_tadamerc20.burn(tokensToBurn) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#241-242)

Reentrancy in CrypteloPublicSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#121-153):
	External calls:
	- whiteListedLevel = isWhiteListed(sender) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#133-134)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributor (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#148-149)
	- contributorAmount (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#148-149)
	- contributorCounter (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#148-149)
	- reservedTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#149-152)
	- tokensLeft (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#145-146)

Reentrancy in CrypteloPublicSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#121-153):
	External calls:
	- whiteListedLevel = isWhiteListed(sender) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#133-134)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(amountEthWei) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#152)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#152)

CrypteloPublicSale.ICOstartTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#33)
CrypteloPublicSale.minimumDonationWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#114-115)
CrypteloERC20.transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#5-6) should be declared external
CrypteloERC20.burn (/unique_chucks/10/0xe9ed43a15c47b4dfe2fb2e2731e438237b483890.sol#6-9) should be declared external
